snippet: Darrelle Revis did not receive the N.F.L.-mandated authorization to resume contact after sustaining a concussion in the season opener.
abstract: New York Jets cornerback Darrelle Revis, who sustained a concussion in the season-opener, is ruled out of second game after failing to receive the NFL-mandated authorization to resume contact; league protocol dictates that players with head injuries must be cleared by a team doctor and an independent neurological consultant.
lead_paragraph: Darrelle Revis did not receive the N.F.L.-mandated authorization to resume contact after sustaining a concussion in the season opener.

headline.seo: Darrelle Revis Ruled Out of Jets-Steelers Game After Concussion
headline.main: Revis Is Ruled Out of Steelers Game
headline.print_headline: Revis Is Ruled Out of Steelers Game
